## Materialien

### Daten

-   Datensatz 1: IMDb Top-Rated TV Series Dataset. Verf√ºgbar unter MIT Lizenz via [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/khushikhushikhushi/imdb-top-rated-tv-series-dataset).

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE}
library("here")
library("downloadthis")
read.csv2("data/data_tvseries.csv") %>%
  download_this(
    output_name = "data_tvseries",
    output_extension = ".csv",
    button_label = "Hier geht es zum Download des TV-Datasets",
    button_type = "default",
    has_icon = FALSE,
    icon = "fa fa-save"
  )
```

-   Datensatz 2: Dataset of Indian Newspaper Horoscopes. Verf√ºgbar unter CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 Lizenz via [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/thedivtagguy/times-of-india-horoscopes-dec-2019-to-june-2021), Autor: Aman Bhargava. Bearbeitet, indem der Datensatz auf die ersten 1,000 Beobachtungen reduziert wurden.

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE}
library("here")

read.csv2("data/data_horoscope.csv") %>%

    output_name = "data_horoscope",

    button_label = "Hier geht es zum Download des Horoskop-Datasets",
```
